languages.text: Выдолбленный в тассерциевой поверхности зрачок глаза кажется бесконечно глубоким. Куда бы ни был повернут амулет, его взгляд следует за вами.
The pupil of the eye hollowed out of the thassertium surface looks unfathomably deep. Whichever way the amulet faces, its gaze seems to follow you.
languages.original_text: Выдолбленный в тассерциевой поверхности зрачок глаза кажется бесконечно глубоким. Куда бы ни был повернут амулет, его взгляд следует за вами.

traits.locale_text: The pupil of an eye scooped into the thassertium surface looks fathomlessly deep. Whichever way the amulet is facing, its gaze follows you.
The pupil of an eye scooped into the thassertium surface looks fathomlessly deep. Whichever way the amulet is facing, its gaze follows you.
The pupil of the eye hollowed out of the thassertium surface looks unfathomably deep. Whichever way the amulet faces, its gaze seems to follow you.
The pupil of the eye hollowed out of the thassertium surface looks unfathomably deep. Whichever way the amulet faces, its gaze seems to follow you.
The pupil of the eye hollowed out of the thassertium surface looks unfathomably deep. Whichever way the amulet faces, its gaze seems to follow you.
The pupil of the eye hollowed out of the thassertium surface looks unfathomably deep. Whichever way the amulet faces, its gaze seems to follow you.

languages.text: タッセリウムの表面に彫られた眼の瞳孔は、底知れぬ深さをたたえている。お守りがどの向きを向いていても、その視線はあなたを追いかけてくるかのようだ。
languages.original_text: The pupil of the eye hollowed out of the thassertium surface looks unfathomably deep. Whichever way the amulet faces, its gaze seems to follow you.

traits.locale_text: タッセリウムの表面に彫られた眼の瞳孔は、底知れぬ深さをたたえている。お守りがどの向きを向いていても、その視線はあなたを追いかけてくるかのようだ。

languages.text: Tasertiyum yüzeyine oyulmuş göz bebeği, akıl sır ermez bir derinliğe sahip. Uğurluğun baktığı yön fark etmeksizin gözleri daima üstünde sanki.
languages.original_text: The pupil of the eye hollowed out of the thassertium surface looks unfathomably deep. Whichever way the amulet faces, its gaze seems to follow you.

traits.locale_text: Tasertiyum yüzeyine oyulmuş göz bebeği, akıl sır ermez bir derinliğe sahip.Uğurluk hangi yöne bakarsa baksın, gözleri daima üstünde sanki.

languages.text: La pupila del ojo tallado en thassertio parece imposiblemente profunda. Mire adonde mire este amuleto, su mirada parece seguirte.
languages.original_text: The pupil of the eye hollowed out of the thassertium surface looks unfathomably deep. Whichever way the amulet faces, its gaze seems to follow you.

traits.locale_text: La pupila del ojo tallado en thassertio parece imposiblemente profunda. Mire adonde mire este amuleto, su mirada parece seguirte.

languages.text: 由塔瑟拉水晶制成的护符，表面挖空的瞳孔看起来深不可测。无论你将这枚护身符朝向哪个方向，它的目光似乎都在盯着你。
languages.original_text: The pupil of the eye hollowed out of the thassertium surface looks unfathomably deep. Whichever way the amulet faces, its gaze seems to follow you.

traits.locale_text: 由塔瑟拉水晶制成的护符，表面挖空的瞳孔看起来深不可测。无论你将这枚护身符朝向哪个方向，它的目光似乎都在盯着你。

languages.text: La pupille de l'œil serti dans la surface en thassertium paraît insondable. Quelle que soit la direction dans laquelle l'amulette est orientée, vous avez l'impression qu'elle ne vous lâche pas du regard.
languages.original_text: The pupil of the eye hollowed out of the thassertium surface looks unfathomably deep. Whichever way the amulet faces, its gaze seems to follow you.

traits.locale_text: La pupille de l'œil serti dans la surface en thassertium paraît insondable. Quelle que soit la direction dans laquelle l'amulette est orientée, vous avez l'impression qu'elle ne vous lâche pas du regard.

languages.text: Der Blick dieses in Thassertim gravierten Auges ist unergründlich. Egal, wie du das Amulett drehst und wendest, scheint dir der Blick zu folgen.
languages.original_text: The pupil of the eye hollowed out of the thassertium surface looks unfathomably deep. Whichever way the amulet faces, its gaze seems to follow you.

traits.locale_text: Der Blick dieses in Thassertim gravierten Auges ist unergründlich. Egal, wie du das Amulett drehst und wendest, scheint dir der Blick zu folgen.
